title: Is there a way to disable transactions?
body: To elaborate, is there a way for me to disable spending on my account?

replies.body: You can remove any stored payment information, but there's no way to disable the store or purchases on an account.  Curious though, is there a specific reason for this request?

Alright then, thanks for the response.

I tend to get a little greedy with transactions sometimes and spend a lot, and that's why I want to disable it. So I don't waste lots of money
